page.title: 17EDUCATION IN SANDBACH
page.content: {SCHOOL}BEGINS AT 8:55 WHEN WE HAVE 1EITHER A FORM,A YEAR OR A HALL{ {ASSEMBLY.}ON A TUESDAY THE FIRST{ {LESSON}IS SCIENCE FOLLOWED BY MATHS WHICH WE HAVE IN ONE OF THE SCHOOL MOBILES.WE ARE LEARNING TO DO PICTURE GRAPHS. BREAK BEGINS AT 10:45 AT LASTS FOR 20 MINUTES.IN THE NEXT LESSON, DRAMA,WE DO LITTLE PLAYS AND SHOW THEM TO ARE TEACHER.IN FRENCH,WE ARE LEARNING ABOUT BUYING FRUIT AND VEGETABLES.AT 12:25 WE HAVE DINNER AND TODAY I BOUGHT CHIPS,BEEFBURGER AND 2 DRINKS.AFTER REGISTRATION AFTERNOON LESSONS BEGIN AT 13:40 WITH MATHS AGAIN! THIS TIME WE ARE DOING PATTERN GRAPHS. I END THE DAY WITH A DOUBLE ART LESSON WHERE WE HAVE TO SKETCH DIFFERENT ASPECTS OF A PLANT.SCHOOL ENDS AT 15:40.THIS IS A TYPICAL DAY IN MY{EDUCATION.}NOW I MUST BEGIN MY HOMEWORK!
